alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Meade County through 215 PM MDT... At 143 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles north of Hereford, or 31 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
